0: A good if not spectacular business hotel
A very nice hotel except for the location
Rooms are beautiful and are a great price
Impressive Business Center computers programmed with easy access to all Airlines for check in
Very attractive facility with upscale ambience at a reasonable rate
When we walked into lobby we were impressed
I made my reservation at least a month before arrival
Several nearby options for outlet shopping and regular retail also
1: Since the only phone was on the night stand next to the bed I needed to work with the technician on the bed
There is no alarm clock or way to se what time it is except in the bathroom
Room lay out was not very helpful
I needed to obtain help from the guest internet help desk
Also for someone in from another time zone it was not helpful to have the only clock in the room be on the bathroom mirror
We had to use Uber on 4 different occasions and had to incur an extra 100 or so because of the inability to use Hotels shuttle that was advertised as a perk of staying there
Shuttle was unavailable on FRIDAY and SATURDAY night as early as 7 pm
Would have been good to know this at the check in
I needed toothpaste they provided this at no cost
